Indian Economy.summary: Tapping talent. This cloud will be an national talent architecture linking schools, universities, research institutions, start-ups, PSUs and the Diaspora

Banking & Finance.summary: MUFG Bank invests ₹39,618 crore for a 20% stake in Shriram Finance, enhancing credit ratings and paving the way for control.

Banking & Finance.summary: Shriram Finance raises ₹39,618 crore from MUFG Bank, marking India’s largest FDI in an NBFC and strengthening capital, governance, and growth prospects.

Banking & Finance.title: Valsad Mahila Nagrik Sahakari Bank faces RBI curbs; depositors eligible for insurance
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI bars withdrawals and limits operations at Valsad Mahila Nagrik Sahakari Bank for six months. Eligible depositors can claim up to ₹5 lakh under DICGC insurance.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI’s central board approves risk-based deposit insurance framework for banks
Banking & Finance.summary: At present, the deposit insurance coverage is limited to ₹5 lakh per depositor of each insured bank. Deposit insurance cover increased from ₹1 lakh to ₹5 lakh with effect from February 4, 2020.

Technology Sector.summary: The youth, a resident of LIC Colony in Selvapuram, died around 11 pm on December 17 without responding to treatment, according to sources familiar with the matter.

Technology Sector.title: With Delhi-Dehradun highway set to open, the burden of being Landour
Technology Sector.summary: Once a sleepy military outpost with its chai points and pine trails, Landour and the larger Mussoorie area now see a rush of tourists across seasons. Can the hill town cope with more?
